name: Nadia Oh
description: '''Nadia Georgina Oates''' (born 26 May 1990) is a former English singer, [[rapper]], producer and model. She was featured on [[Space Cowboy (musician)|Space Cowboy]]'s 2007 single "[[My Egyptian Lover]]". She has since released two studio albums—''[[Hot Like Wow]]'' (2008) and ''[[Colours (Nadia Oh album)|Colours]]'' (2011)—both entirely produced by Space Cowboy.
